thread.title: Bluepoint Solutions Launches New Version of WebShare for Content eDelivery to Account Holders
thread.title_full: Bluepoint Solutions Launches New Version of WebShare for Content eDelivery to Account Holders - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Bluepoint Solutions Launches New Version of WebShare for Content eDelivery to Account Holders
text:
Redesign Improves Digital Delivery of Statements and Other Content Through Email, Online and Mobile Channels
Henderson, NV
Bluepoint Solutions today unveiled, from the 2015 BAI Retail Delivery Conference, its expanded and redesigned WebShare product, which provides account holders with self-service access to their financial documents and information. The new version includes a new user interface, responsive design for access on any device, a unique in-house email component for both e-statements and many other types of communications, and extensive customization opportunities across the board. The new release is available for immediate deployment.
WebShare, a component of Bluepoint’s industry-leading FASTdocs suite of content management solutions, extends access to financial records to the self-service channel. “With WebShare, credit unions can now reach their members whenever and wherever they are,” said Bluepoint Director of Marketing Alissa Fry-Harris. “And the new release includes a wide array of options for personalizing and unifying the look and feel of every part of the users’ experience.”
E-statements make financial and environmental sense, and WebShare now makes eDelivery attractive by offering institutions the flexibility to use a single, cost-effective email solution for all types of communications, from tax documents to promotional emails, and from scheduled to one-time, on-the-fly notifications. Select features include:
Seamless integration with online and mobile banking systems, including user authentication.
Access to financial documents stored within the FASTdocs content management system based on permissions determined by the institution.
A flexible email preference center, fully integrated with settings in the core system for consistent, compliant application across all platforms.
Director of Product Management Cameron Marks adds, “With WebShare, we’ve updated our content management and delivery solutions to give institutions everything they need to serve today’s account holders, and at the same time take advantage of a quick return on investment.”
About Bluepoint Solutions
Bluepoint Solutions provides end-to-end payment processing and content management solutions to financial institutions nationwide. Over 1,400 credit unions and banks that have deployed its enterprise technology are successfully achieving their strategic goals of increasing employee productivity, reducing operating costs, enhancing performance levels, and meeting relentless technology and industry changes with resilience and excellence. Learn more at http://www.bluepointsolutions.com .
